Terms of Service for TheHigherUps Archive

Effective as of: 7/04/2022

By accessing TheHigherUps Archive you agree to the following terms.


TheHigherUps Archive is an invite only service.
You are unable to make a request to join the service if you do not have access to the service.
By gaining access to TheHigherUps Archive, you sign a mutual NDA prohibiting the distribution of the accounts with access to the service.
You are also prohibited from distributing content that is inside TheHigherUps Archive with anyone with or without access to The Archive.
Failure to comply with the NDA may result in removal from the service, account termination, or legal action.

You must be above the age of 18 years or older to access the site

TheHigherUps reserve the right to modify or delete any images uploaded to the service without warning

TheHigherUps reserves the right to delete or modify your account without warning

Understand that content uploaded to TheHigherUps Archive may not appeal to you or may feel morally wrong

You will only upload content that is of high quality

TheHigherUps Archive is presented to you AS IS, without any warranty, express or implied.


Prohibited Content

Do not upload any of the following content to TheHigherUps Archive:


Child Pornography: Any photograph or photorealistic drawing or movie that depicts children in a sexual manner. This includes nudity, explicit sex, implied sex, or sexually persuasive positions.

Poor Quality Images: Any image where compression artifacts are easily visible

Grotesque: Any depiction of extreme mutilation, extreme bodily distension, feces.

Bestiality: Any photograph or photorealistic drawing or movie that depicts humans having sex (either explicit or implied) with other non-human animals.


Information We Collect

Your display name

Your email address

Your IP address

TheHigherUps Archive will not diclose your IP address with anyone unless applicable by law
